WorkItem.Description:
When DataGrid is bound to ICollectionView, ICollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext() moves selections on the DataGrid, but DataGrid.CurrentItem does not change.
 
To repro:
1. Open attached solution and run.
2. Press space bar and you will see it moves selection in both ListBox and DataGrid.
3. Click a cell in the DataGrid to set focus and CurrentItem
4. Press space bar
 
RESULT:
The selection of the DataGrid moves to the next row, but focus and CurrentItem does not move.
WorkItem.Summary: ICollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext() moves selection to next row, but CurrentItem does not move
